name: Exercise #3: Airbnb Desktop Clone
description:
3rd Task of Ironhack's UX/UI Designer Course:


Story Time:


This task was about mimicking the Airbnb's website as much as possible, with Oregon's background. The background used on this exercise is from Puerto Rico, where I was born. ğŸğŸ‡µğŸ‡·


I didn't find, this task, as complicated as the rocket, because I didn't work with shapes. Of course, I was going back and forth with the rocket and the moon, but got to finish this one in a faster time than what I expected.


I have to continue practicing and learn more on:

  • How to setup icons without backgrounds.
  • How to use components.
  • Identify the font used based on background's tones, content' subject, colors, and mood expected from the product.
